it.polimi.deib.se2018.adrenalina.Controller

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.deib.se2018.adrenalina.Controller.Controller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Observer<ResponseInput>

    public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
implements Observer<ResponseInput>
    This class is used to communicate with the view using different type of request and use the response to interact with model
    Author:
    Karroot

      int numberOfPlayerActive()
      This method say how many players are connected and active(online) Hint: using when the phase of login is completed
      void spawn(int index, Player p)
      this method spawn the player
      void startGame()
      this method is used to start the game first it check if we are in terminator mode and in that case create the player terminator called termi and set it to the gameboard the it set all player in gameboard and while the endgame flag is false or the number of active player are more than 2 it continue to execute a for cycle on all player in the gameboard in that for we execute the round for each player with a distinction only if we are in final frenzy mode
      void update(ResponseInput message)
      this method is used to take the response of the different query to the virtual view

        Parameters:

        skullCounter - number of skull counter

      • getHeroComment

        public java.lang.String getHeroComment(int index)
                                throws java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException
        This method returns the hero comment of player represented by an index Hint: using when the phase of login is completed
        Parameters:
        index - represents the number of the player which you want the hero comment
        Returns:
        the hero comment of the player represented by the index passed
        Throws:
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if index is wrong

      • startGame

        public void startGame()
        this method is used to start the game first it check if we are in terminator mode and in that case create the player terminator called termi and set it to the gameboard the it set all player in gameboard and while the endgame flag is false or the number of active player are more than 2 it continue to execute a for cycle on all player in the gameboard in that for we execute the round for each player with a distinction only if we are in final frenzy mode

      • spawn

        public void spawn(int index,
                  Player p)
        this method spawn the player
        Parameters:
        index - of the power up to use for spawn
        p - play to spawn

      • grab

        public void grab()
          throws java.lang.InterruptedException,
                 java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException,
                 SquareNotInGameBoard
        this method ask the player where he want to move to grab
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if executor.invokeAny fail
        java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException - if executor.invokeAny fail
        SquareNotInGameBoard - if square is not in gameboard

        this method is used to take the response of the different query to the virtual view
